name: ALPHA ROUGE 64 (early access)
description:
ALPHA ROUGE 64 is a 3D platformer inspired by 32/64bit era of games.

The gameplay mainly consists of two parts:

  • 3D adventure part, where you're free to explore huge hub worlds
  • 2D action part, where fast-paced platforming frenzy takes place!

This project is in early stages of development.

Current early access build includes 1 hub world and 1 action stage. The early access will be updated with new content frequently.

Plans for upcoming updates:

  • Improved 3rd person control/camera
  • Improved character model/animations
  • More levels
  • More hub worlds
  • Airship traveling between worlds
  • Proper UI/loading screens
  • Overall polishing & more

This game is a one-man project. I sincirely appreciate you supporting the project and hope to deliver more and more fun as it grows!
